mapper.select: SELECT rno,bno,id,nickname,msg,TO_CHAR(regdate,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as dbday,poster FROM community_reply WHERE bno=#{bno} ORDER BY rno ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM community_reply WHERE bno=#{bno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO community_reply(rno,bno,id,nickname,msg,regdate,group_id,group_step,group_tap,poster) VALUES( (SELECT NVL(MAX(rno)+1, 1) FROM community_reply), #{bno},#{id},#{nickname},#{msg},SYSDATE, (SELECT NVL(MAX(group_id)+1, 1) FROM community_reply),0,0,#{poster})
